nodes.text: The DS-11 Starforged sniper rifle was a model of blaster sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Similar to the DS-8 Starforged sniper rifle and DS-9 Starforged sniper rifle, it featured a longer barrel and additional components on its stock.
The DS-11 Starforged sniper rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Master's Shadow Pack.
